data.title: 45th Anniversary at Prytania Uptown, Prytania
data.meta_description: MAD MAX (1979)Austrian Cut45 AnniversaryRelease date: February 15, 1980Director: George MillerStory by: George Miller; Byron KennedyIn a not-too-distant dystopian future, when man's most precious resource -- oil -- has been depleted and the world plunged into war, famine and financial chaos, the last vestiges of the law in Australia attempt to restrain a vicious biker gang. Max (Mel Gibson), an officer with the Main Force Patrol, launches a personal vendetta against the gang when his wife (Joanne Samuel) and son are hunted down and murdered, leaving him with nothing but the instincts for survival and retribution.
data.text:
Mad Max (1979) - 45th Anniversary

93 mins | Rated R | Action

Directed by George Miller | Starring Steve Bisley, Hugh Keays-Byrne, Joanne Samuel, Tim Burns, Mel Gibson
